summary: plays the 2sad4me sound when you die.
descriptionHtml:
2sad4me death sound in nexus mod manager
apparently this mod was popular in steam workshop so i decided to upload it to nmm.
STEAM WORKSHOP LINK :http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=367514414
[u][b]
WHAT IT DOES[/b][/u]
plays 2sad4me sound when you die.

[b][u]HOW TO INSTALL[/u][/b]
climb up a skyscraper and eat a doughnut
then send me 100 keys in steam or something

[b][u]COMPATITABILITY[/u][/b]
almost anything ( if im not wrong )

[b][u]INCOMPATITABILTIYTY[/u][/b]
mods that replace death sound (IF IM NOT WRONG I HAVENT TRIED IT YET BECAUSE IM LAZY)


[youtube]hfug6977vjw[/youtube]

this is made by custardbread(nexus)
                       longdingdong(steam)
 those 2 are the same ppl
author: custardbread and long ding dong
